resources.string: Select whether you are Vegan, Vegetarian or Pescatarian
Select this to replace any Red with magenta
Select your preferred colour for text

This application works by taking a picture of an ingredients list on a food product, the ingredients are then analysed and checked against a database of ingredients that or not suitable for vegans, vegetarians and pescatarians, depending on your chosen preference in the settings page.

Vegan: These are ingredients that are not derived from animals.\nVegetarian: These are ingredients that include no meat or fish products.\nPescatarian: These are ingredients that contain no meat products.
To provide feedback on accessibility, our ingredients database or the app as a whole please email feedback@emailaddress.com.

To start scanning ingredients simply click the Scan Now button below to capture an image or import a saved image. For best results crop image to ingredients list.

To add new ingredients or change your dietary preference and accessibility settings click the Settings button below.

To see more information including a list of all our known ingredients click the More Info button.
